attributes.action: make job searching easier for people with special needs (autism, aspergers, etc) and to ban over 16 hours paid working limit for weekly allowance being taken off of benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who thinks it is unfair that people with special needs have their weekly allowance cut down if they go to work and do more hours than 16?

They have every right to do a job for a living! They can't just be stuck at home all their life!
